body:
Trying to cache package `pdt` fails on all OS tested (RHEL7, Ubuntu 18.04, CentOS 7).

Using Spack @ develop (commit c9a715b190c7a):

```
$> spack buildcache create -afr --key prl --only package -d . pdt
...
==> Error: patchelf --print-rpath /tmp/tmpoxav2kl7/pdt-3.25.1-czegb3ismtstyml2wugkifojybw4cacs/ibm64linux/bin/taucpdisp4101 produced an error Command exited with status 1:
    '/opt/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-ppc64le/gcc-7.5.0/patchelf-0.10-smtqyqipsk2qv5okgacdrlyazoxrv2z4/bin/patchelf' '--print-rpath' '/tmp/tmpoxav2kl7/pdt-3.25.1-czegb3ismtstyml2wugkifojybw4cacs/ibm64linux/bin/taucpdisp4101'
patchelf: cannot find section '.dynamic'. The input file is most likely statically linked
```

@gartung
title: buildcache create fails for pdt
